title: Attitude (Generic)
description: A generic schema for attitude and rotational rates.
$comment: Providers should $ref this schema directly but Attitudes.schema.json instead.

rx.description: Rottional rate about the X axis

ry.description: Rotational rate about the Y axis

rz.description: Rotational rate about the Z axis

time.description: Time [UTC, ISO 8601] of this data, if different than the trigger time.
